channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- pe-client-tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Puppet -- pe-client-tools

item.title: CVE-2018-6516|2024-08-05T06:10:09.983Z -- puppet -- pe-client-tools
item.description: On Windows only, with a specifically crafted configuration file an attacker could get Puppet PE client tools (aka pe-client-tools) 16.4.x prior to 16.4.6, 17.3.x prior to 17.3.6, and 18.1.x prior to 18.1.2 to load arbitrary code with privilege escalation.
